q1.content: This might be repetitive, but before we go on to the next section, I want to quickly make sure I have this right: who are you living with right now?
q1.requirement: Confirm the relationships of all individuals living with the interviewee.

q2.requirement: Determine whether there are any babies or small children in the household.
q2.condition: The interviewee has not indicated that they live alone.

q3.content: Anyone who usually lives here but is away – traveling, at school, or in a hospital?
q3.requirement: Ask about household members who are temporarily absent.

q4.content: Any lodgers, boarders, or employees who live here?
q4.requirement: Find out if there are any lodgers, boarders, or employees residing in the household.
q4.condition: The interviewee has not indicated that they live alone.

q5.content: Who shares the responsibility for the rent, mortgage, or other household expenses?
q5.requirement: Identify other individuals in the household who contribute to rent, mortgage, or other expenses.
